hero.name: Hamza CHARAFI
hero.title: Senior Front-End Developer - ReactJS
hero.subtitle: Specialized in React.js, Next.js & TypeScript
hero.description: 9+ years of experience building scalable web applications with modern technologies. Passionate about creating exceptional user experiences and writing clean, maintainable code.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
about.intro: Senior Front-End Developer with 9+ years of experience

bio.paragraph1: I'm a Senior Front-End Developer with over 9 years of experience in building robust and scalable web applications. My expertise lies in the React.js ecosystem, including Next.js, TypeScript, and modern state management solutions like Redux Toolkit and Zustand.
bio.paragraph2: Throughout my career, I've worked with prestigious companies like Ekino, La Réunion Aérienne, Disneyland Paris, and Capgemini, delivering high-quality solutions that improve user experience and business outcomes. I specialize in creating reusable components, optimizing performance, and implementing best practices.
bio.paragraph3: I'm passionate about clean code, test-driven development, and continuous learning. I actively follow industry trends through platforms like Udemy, Frontend Masters, and Egghead, and contribute to team success through code reviews, pair programming, and knowledge sharing.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's work together
contact.description: I'm currently open to new opportunities and interesting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
